entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 02:35 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
